Caption: Dr. A. L. Mudaliar, Chairman, Board of Governors, addresses the audience
Description: On the dais (from left), Dr. G. S. Laddha, Director, A. C. College of Technology, Madras, Dr. K. S. G. Doss, Chemicals and Plastics India Ltd. Madras, Prof. S. Sampath, Department of Electrical Engineering, Prof. A. Ramachandran, Director, Chief guest Dr. Vikram A. Sarabhai, dignitary (yet to be identified), dignitary (yet to be identified), Dr. A. L. Mudaliar (standing), Chairman, Board of Governors, Dr. E. G. Ramachandran, member of Senate, Dr. M. V. C. Sastri, member of Senate and Dr. S. D. Nigam, member of Senate. The rest of the dignitaries are yet to be identified. The Chairman, in a brief speech, paid a tribute to the outstanding contributions made by Dr. Sarabhai to the countryâ€™s scientific and technological progress, and requested him to address the graduates.
